name: Zucchini-Tomato Salad
keywords: anchovy fillets, tomato, zucchini, appetizer, side dish, dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley or basil

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the ends of the zucchini and cut them slightly on the bias into 1/4-inch thick slices. Drop the slices into boiling salted water. Let them simmer half a minute. The zucchini should remain crunchy. Drain and let cool.

Arrange the zucchini and tomatoes in alternate patterns in a round dish. Sprinkle with the onions and chopped egg. Arrange the anchovy fillets on top. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, vinegar and oil. Add the parsley and serve.
